todoist¶

exception pytodoist.todoist.BadImageError(response)[source]¶

Raised when a user tries to use an invalid image as their avatar.

exception pytodoist.todoist.EmailMismatchError(response)[source]¶

Raised when an oauth2_token is valid but the given user email is not associated with it.

exception pytodoist.todoist.InternalError(response)[source]¶

Raised when the Todoist server is unable to connect to Google.

This exception may also be raised if the response from Google is unable to be parsed. It makes sense to repeat the attempt with the same parameters later.

exception pytodoist.todoist.LoginError(response)[source]¶

Raised when a user’s login credentials are invalid.

exception pytodoist.todoist.NoGoogleLinkError(response)[source]¶

Raised when an oauth2_token is valid but the user’s Todoist account is not linked to Google.

exception pytodoist.todoist.NotFoundError(response)[source]¶

Raised when a user tries to access an item or project that does not exist.

exception pytodoist.todoist.RegistrationError(response)[source]¶

Raised when trying to register an account with details that are already associated with a current Todoist user.

exception pytodoist.todoist.TodoistValueError(response)[source]¶

Raised when an invalid value is passed in a requested to the Todoist server.
